list.expr: sum by (pod, container) (changes(kube_pod_container_status_restarts_total{job="kube-state-metrics", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__interval])) > 0
list.name: Container restart

targets.expr:
# min by(pod, container) should fix overlapping data on container restarts
sum by (pod) (min by(pod, container) (min_over_time(kube_pod_container_status_ready{job="kube-state-metrics", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval]))) / sum by (pod) (kube_pod_container_info{job="kube-state-metrics", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"})

# sum without(container) fixes issues if job labels has changed
sum by (pod) (max by(pod, container) (
  max_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", resource="cpu"}[$__range])
))

# sum without(container) fixes issues if job labels has changed
sum by (pod) (max by(pod, container) (
  max_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", resource="cpu"}[$__range])
))

# sum without(container) fixes issues if job labels has changed
sum by (pod) (max by(pod, container) (
  max_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", resource="memory"}[$__range])
))

# sum without(container) fixes issues if job labels has changed
sum by (pod) (max by(pod, container) (
  max_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", resource="memory"}[$__range])
))
sum by (pod) (max_over_time(kube_pod_container_status_restarts_total{job="kube-state-metrics", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(pod) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval]))
scalar(max(kube_resourcequota{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", type="hard", resource="requests.cpu"}))
scalar(max(kube_resourcequota{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", type="hard", resource="limits.cpu"}))

sum by(pod) (
  max by(pod, container) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval]))
  /
  max by(pod, container) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", resource="cpu"})
)
scalar(max(kube_resourcequota{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", type="hard", resource="requests.memory"}))

# max by(pod, container) should fix overlapping data on container restarts
sum by (pod) (max by(pod, container) (max_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", resource="memory"}[$__interval])))
sum (max by(pod, container) (max_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", resource="memory"}[$__interval])))
scalar(max(kube_resourcequota{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", type="hard", resource="limits.memory"}))

# max by(pod, container) should fix overlapping data on container restarts
sum by (pod) (max by(pod, container) (max_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", resource="memory"}[$__interval])))
sum (max by(pod, container) (max_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", resource="memory"}[$__interval])))

# max by(pod, container) should fix overlapping data on container restarts
sum by (pod) (max by(pod, container) (max_over_time(container_memory_rss{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval])))
sum (max by(pod, container) (max_over_time(container_memory_rss{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval])))

# max by(pod, container) should fix overlapping data on container restarts
sum by (pod) (max by(pod, container) (max_over_time(container_memory_working_set_bytes{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval])))
sum (max by(pod, container) (max_over_time(container_memory_working_set_bytes{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval])))

# max by(pod, container) should fix overlapping data on container restarts
sum by (pod) (max by(pod, container) (max_over_time(container_memory_rss{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval])) / max by (pod, container) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", resource="memory"}))

# max by(pod, container) should fix overlapping data on container restarts
sum by (pod) (max by(pod, container) (max_over_time(container_memory_working_set_bytes{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval])) / max by (pod, container) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", resource="memory"}))
sum(rate(container_network_receive_bytes_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval])) by (pod)
sum(rate(container_network_transmit_bytes_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval])) by (pod)

sum by(pod) (rate(container_fs_reads_bytes_total{container!="", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval]) + rate(container_fs_writes_bytes_total{container!="", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval]))

options.content:
Read/write from NFS and SMB shares
will not be shown in the storage throughput.

Cadvisor exports data from cgroup io.stats,
which are only calculated for block devices.
